verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֤א <S%H4853><s%> The burden דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> of the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land חַדְרָ֔ךְ <S%H2317><s%> of Hadrach וְדַמֶּ֖שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> and Damascus מְנֻחָת֑וֹ <S%H4496><s%> [shall be] the rest כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [shall be] toward the LORD עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> thereof when the eyes אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of man וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> of all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> as of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also חֲמָ֖ת <S%H2574><s%> And Hamath תִּגְבָּל־ <S%H1379><s%> also shall border בָּ֑הּ צֹ֣ר <S%H6865><s%> thereby Tyrus וְצִיד֔וֹן <S%H6721><s%> and Zidon כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> though חָֽכְמָ֖ה <S%H2449><s%> wise מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> though it be very

וַתִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> did build צֹ֛ר <S%H6865><s%> And Tyrus מָצ֖וֹר <S%H4692><s%> herself a strong hold לָ֑הּ וַתִּצְבָּר־ <S%H6651><s%> and heaped up כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> silver כֶּֽעָפָ֔ר <S%H6083><s%> as the dust וְחָר֖וּץ <S%H2742><s%> and fine gold כְּטִ֥יט <S%H2916><s%> as the mire חוּצֽוֹת׃ <S%H2351><s%> of the streets

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> Behold the Lord יֽוֹרִשֶׁ֔נָּה <S%H3423><s%> will cast her out וְהִכָּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> and he will smite בַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> in the sea חֵילָ֑הּ <S%H2428><s%> her power וְהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he בָּאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire תֵּאָכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> and she shall be devoured

תֵּרֶ֨א <S%H7200><s%> shall see אַשְׁקְל֜וֹן <S%H831><s%> Ashkelon וְתִירָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> [it] and fear וְעַזָּה֙ <S%H5804><s%> Gaza וְתָחִ֣יל <S%H2342><s%> sorrowful מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> also [shall see it] and be very וְעֶקְר֖וֹן <S%H6138><s%> and Ekron כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֹבִ֣ישׁ <S%H954><s%> has been מֶבָּטָ֑הּ <S%H4007><s%> for her expectation וְאָ֤בַד <S%H6><s%> shall perish מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> and the king מֵֽעַזָּ֔ה <S%H5804><s%> from Gaza וְאַשְׁקְל֖וֹן <S%H831><s%> and Ashkelon לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֵשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> shall not be inhabited

וְיָשַׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> shall dwell מַמְזֵ֖ר <S%H4464><s%> And a bastard בְּאַשְׁדּ֑וֹד <S%H795><s%> in Ashdod וְהִכְרַתִּ֖י <S%H3772><s%> and I will cut off גְּא֥וֹן <S%H1347><s%> the pride פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines

וַהֲסִרֹתִ֨י <S%H5493><s%> And I will take away דָמָ֜יו <S%H1818><s%> his blood מִפִּ֗יו <S%H6310><s%> out of his mouth וְשִׁקֻּצָיו֙ <S%H8251><s%> and his abominations מִבֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between שִׁנָּ֔יו <S%H8127><s%> from between his teeth וְנִשְׁאַ֥ר <S%H7604><s%> but he that remaineth גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֵֽאלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> even he [shall be] for our God וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> and be like כְּאַלֻּ֣ף <S%H441><s%> and he shall be as a governor בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> in Judah וְעֶקְר֖וֹן <S%H6138><s%> and Ekron כִּיבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> as a Jebusite

וְחָנִ֨יתִי <S%H2583><s%> And I will encamp לְבֵיתִ֤י <S%H1004><s%> about mine house מִצָּבָה֙ <S%H4675><s%> because of the army מֵעֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> because of him that passeth by וּמִשָּׁ֔ב <S%H7725><s%> and because of him that returneth וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no יַעֲבֹ֧ר <S%H5674><s%> shall pass through עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> over ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> anymore נֹגֵ֑שׂ <S%H5065><s%> and no oppressor כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now רָאִ֥יתִי <S%H7200><s%> them any more for now have I seen בְעֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> with mine eyes ס

גִּילִ֨י <S%H1523><s%> Rejoice מְאֹ֜ד <S%H3966><s%> greatly בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter צִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion הָרִ֙יעִי֙ <S%H7321><s%> shout בַּ֣ת <S%H1323><s%> O daughter יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold מַלְכֵּךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> behold thy King יָ֣בוֹא <S%H935><s%> cometh לָ֔ךְ צַדִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> unto thee he [is] just וְנוֹשָׁ֖ע <S%H3467><s%> and having salvation ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עָנִי֙ <S%H6041><s%> lowly וְרֹכֵ֣ב <S%H7392><s%> and riding עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on חֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> upon an ass וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עַ֖יִר <S%H5895><s%> and upon a colt בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the foal אֲתֹנֽוֹת׃ <S%H860><s%> of an ass

וְהִכְרַתִּי־ <S%H3772><s%> And I will cut off רֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> the chariot מֵאֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> from Ephraim וְסוּס֙ <S%H5483><s%> and the horse מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem וְנִכְרְתָה֙ <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off קֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> bow מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> and the battle וְדִבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> and he shall speak שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace לַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> unto the heathen וּמָשְׁלוֹ֙ <S%H4915><s%> and his dominion מִיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> [shall be] from sea עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> [even] to sea וּמִנָּהָ֖ר <S%H5104><s%> and from the river עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> [even] to the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אַ֣תְּ <S%H859><s%> you בְּדַם־ <S%H1818><s%> As for thee also by the blood בְּרִיתֵ֗ךְ <S%H1285><s%> of thy covenant שִׁלַּ֤חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> I have sent forth אֲסִירַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H615><s%> thy prisoners מִבּ֔וֹר <S%H953><s%> out of the pit אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> wherein no מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> wherein [is] no water בּֽוֹ׃

שׁ֚וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Turn לְבִצָּר֔וֹן <S%H1225><s%> you to the strong hold אֲסִירֵ֖י <S%H615><s%> ye prisoners הַתִּקְוָ֑ה <S%H8615><s%> of hope גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> very הַיּ֕וֹם <S%H3117><s%> even to day מַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> do I declare מִשְׁנֶ֖ה <S%H4932><s%> double אָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> [that] I will render לָֽךְ׃

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for דָרַ֨כְתִּי <S%H1869><s%> When I have bent לִ֜י יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah קֶ֚שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> the bow מִלֵּ֣אתִי <S%H4390><s%> for me filled אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> with Ephraim וְעוֹרַרְתִּ֤י <S%H5782><s%> and raised up בָנַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H1121><s%> thy sons צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> O Zion עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בָּנַ֖יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> against thy sons יָוָ֑ן <S%H3120><s%> O Greece וְשַׂמְתִּ֖יךְ <S%H7760><s%> and made כְּחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> thee as the sword גִּבּֽוֹר׃ <S%H1368><s%> of a mighty man

וַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> over יֵֽרָאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> shall be seen וְיָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> shall go forth כַבָּרָ֖ק <S%H1300><s%> as the lightning חִצּ֑וֹ <S%H2671><s%> over them and his arrow וַֽאדֹנָ֤י <S%H136><s%> and the Lord יְהֹוִה֙ <S%H3069><s%> GOD בַּשּׁוֹפָ֣ר <S%H7782><s%> the trumpet יִתְקָ֔ע <S%H8628><s%> shall blow וְהָלַ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and shall go בְּסַעֲר֥וֹת <S%H5591><s%> with whirlwinds תֵּימָֽן׃ <S%H8486><s%> of the south

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD צְבָאוֹת֮ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts יָגֵ֣ן <S%H1598><s%> shall defend עֲלֵיהֶם֒ <S%H5921><s%> and they וְאָכְל֗וּ <S%H398><s%> them and they shall devour וְכָֽבְשׁוּ֙ <S%H3533><s%> and subdue אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> stones קֶ֔לַע <S%H7050><s%> with sling וְשָׁת֥וּ <S%H8354><s%> and they shall drink הָמ֖וּ <S%H1993><s%> [and] make a noise כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> with יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> as through wine וּמָֽלְאוּ֙ <S%H4390><s%> and they shall be filled כַּמִּזְרָ֔ק <S%H4219><s%> like bowls כְּזָוִיּ֖וֹת <S%H2106><s%> [and] as the corners מִזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar

וְֽהוֹשִׁיעָ֞ם <S%H3467><s%> shall save יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H430><s%> their God בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> them in that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כְּצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> as the flock עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> For אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> for they [shall be as] the stones נֵ֔זֶר <S%H5145><s%> of a crown מִֽתְנוֹסְס֖וֹת <S%H5264><s%> lifted up as an ensign עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in אַדְמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H127><s%> upon his land

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what טּוּב֖וֹ <S%H2898><s%> For how great [is] his goodness וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יָפְי֑וֹ <S%H3308><s%> and how great [is] his beauty דָּגָן֙ <S%H1715><s%> corn בַּֽחוּרִ֔ים <S%H970><s%> shall make the young men וְתִיר֖וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> and new wine יְנוֹבֵ֥ב <S%H5107><s%> cheerful בְּתֻלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1330><s%> the maids
